notes: Fixed Issue where error could occur if user selected the actual full collection in scene graph
Fixed drawing issue for the material Template tool (assign vehicle shader materials preassigned from Giants)
stable.message: A New Stable build Is Available.

notes: Added a Color Library Tool with 3 tabs of Libraries (User created/Giants Brands/Popular Color Library {colors are based off of hex colors from public documents so its possible some popular ones could be wrong but more likely they just dont look right in blenders lighting} )
beta.message: A New Beta Build Is Available.

notes: New Vehicle Light Setup Tool (Static Light workflow): create lights in Blender with pre-export validation to catch common setup problems before Giants Editor; includes manual-light inspection + basic test controls.

alpha.message: A New Alpha Build Is Available. I do not suggest being in ALPHA.
